agbListItem1: Standardization of incoming / outbound requests (single source)
agbListItem3: Better oversight and control of outstanding guarantee portfolio
agbListItem4: Significantly reduced reconciliation effort between all parties
agbListItem5: Secure records resistant to tampering, fraud
agbListItem6: Digital process that facilitates remote working (covid-19 impact)
agListItem7: Seamless integration of issuance, request and release processe
aListItem9: Access all guarantors through the one platform (both banks & sureties)
aListItem11: Faster repayment (where contingent on guarantee receipt)
aListItem12: Elimination of commission fees (from outstanding guarantees)
gListItem13: Increased level of service to clients
gListItem14: Digital Guarantees as a new product offering
gListItem15: Reduced time & effort on queries from clients
gListItem16: Guarantee Vault as a new channel for origination
bListItem18: Eliminates the problem of misplaced or lost guarantees
